Gdańsk University of Technology: The Gdańsk University of Technology (Gdańsk Tech, former GUT; Polish: Politechnika Gdańska) is a technical university in the Wrzeszcz borough of Gdańsk, and one of the oldest universities in Poland. It has eight faculties and with 41 fields of study and more than 18 thousand[3] undergraduate, as well as about 626[4] doctoral students. It employs 2768 people, including 1313 academic teachers.[5]
